programme.title: Survivor 42
programme.desc: Jeff Probst returns to Fiji to host the latest season of Survivor with an all-new group of contestants.

programme.title: The Kelly Clarkson Show S3
programme.desc: Winner of Daytime Emmy Awards 2020 and 2021 for Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show Host and Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show. Won Outstanding Lighting Direction and Outstanding Art Direction/Set Decoration/Scenic Design for Daytime Emmy Awards 2020.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced 25min evergreen finished series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, bad-ass stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released. Each episode you'll get all the secrets straight from your favorite action heroes, get exclusive trivia and special reports from the most dangerous film sets.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films & Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Donal's Super Food In Minutes
programme.desc: Donal Skehan is the thinking chef's chef. In this highly watchable series, he shows us how to create quick, easy, delicious meals inspired by global cuisine and bursting with flavour. Admired by renowned chefs like Nigella Lawson and Jamie Oliver for his creative, innovative approach to cooking, Donal focuses on everyday cooking, using ten ingredients or less and never spending more than thirty minutes on a meal. With an emphasis on ease, health and flavour he uses pared-back kitchen skills.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Kitchen Notebook: London
programme.desc: Rachel Khoo immerses herself in one of the world's most exciting food destinations - London. Always in pursuit of the perfect way to cure her food cravings, Rachel is shopping, eating and cooking her way around the capital; capturing the city's culinary inspiration like any modern food obsessive - blogging about it, snapping photos, and sketching in her trusty notebook, with the series style reflecting these influences.

programme.title: The Wonderful World of Baby Animals
programme.desc: Take an inside look at the most important and experimental months of newborn animals' lives. Experience the trials, tribulations and triumphs. See what they get up to when no-one's watching. And find out what drives their joyous - and sometimes strange - behaviour.

programme.title: Teddies
programme.desc: Dom doesn't quite understand why his friends don't want to play with him today. Eventually, he realises that it's because he doesn't listen to their ideas. The Teddies are playing shops and Tizzy has opened a bakery. When her friends want to buy other things besides tasty treats, she opens more and more shops and eventually can't keep up with serving them.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S2
programme.desc: Sneeze always hides behind the armchair when playing Hidey Findey - but today, he proves Hiccup wrong by finding a better hiding spot; one thats perhaps a little too good.

programme.title: Tumble Leaf S4
programme.desc: Tumble Leaf is set in a whimsical land where a small blue fox named Fig plays each day and discovers adventure, friendship and love around every bend in the path.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2
programme.desc: Travelling the world with their teacher, mentor and friend Ubercorn, a disco-grooving unicorn, the Go Jetters are fixing the mishaps caused by the mischievous meddlings of Grandmaster Glitch in new locations including Central Park in New York, Machu Picchu, China, Japan, Mali, and Petra in Jordan. And now we get to know our plucky international heroes, Xuli, Kyan, Lars and Foz even better, as Series 2 takes us to the top-secret island home of the Go Jet Academy to see them intraining.

programme.title: Pororo The Little Penguin S7
programme.desc: Pororo is a Little Penguin with big dreams! He lives on a tiny island with his friends Eddy the Fox, Loopy the Beaver, Poby the Polar Bear, and Crong the Dinosaur to name a few and they planned for the best fun ever in this new season.

programme.title: 123 Number Squad S1
programme.desc: The Number Squad brainstorm and work hard together to find a way to use the limited amount of sand to build 7 sandcastle homes for all the 7 families of crabs. Can the Number squad handle two problems at the same time, help relocate the sea urchins so that they won't hurt anyone and also solve the algae problem before Shelly's concert begins?

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic S9
programme.desc: This series follows a pony named Twilight Sparkle as she learns about friendship in the town of Ponyville with her friends.The ponies share adventures and help other residents of Ponyville, while working out the troublesome moments in their own friendship.

programme.title: PJ Masks S3
programme.desc: Join Catboy, Owlette and Gekko as the heroic trio goes into the night to save the day!

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series S23
programme.desc: The bond between people and Pokemon can translate into spectacular magic!

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger: S2 Spinoff
programme.desc: When Zari finds a helpless baby Civet beneath an HDB void deck table, it's a delicate balancing act between protecting the baby and finding its mother.

programme.title: Animal Rescue
programme.desc: Rody rescues a white mouse who was also captured by BM corporation. The white mouse introduces himself as the smartest creature in the world and suggests Rody escape the laboratory together. They are about to rescue all the captured animals until BM Corp's research trios appear.

programme.title: DENVER the Last Dinosaur
programme.desc: Where most kids dream of having a dog, a cat, or even a hamster, Cliff has a dinosaur - Denver! Within adventures revolving around Cliff, Denver and a comedic crew of human friends, there's an inevitable monkey wrench that is always in play - Denver is a dino in a china shop! Moreover, being one-of- a-kind puts Denver on everyone's radar.

programme.title: OddBods S3
programme.desc: The OddBods return for a new season of fun and laughter!

programme.title: Ok-to Try
programme.desc: Have you thought about creating a pizza with only your favourite toppings? In this episode, our Try-ers get creative with their choice of ingredients on a pizza.

programme.title: 44 Cats - First Series
programme.desc: The Buffycats are rehearsing for their concert when Archibald, Lampo's uncle, comes visit. After criticizing his behavior, Archibald decides to spend the day teaching him good manners. Will Archibald manage to turn Lampo into a gentlecat?

programme.title: Every Singaporean Son 3
programme.desc: Every Singaporean Son 3 (ESS3) is reality-based observationary documentary which mainly focuses on the Specialist Corps, showcasing their leadership as young and junior SAF commanders against the backdrop of the Basic Military Training (BMT).

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Super Hero High
programme.desc: Super Hero High is buzzing with excitement over new student Supergirl. But when Supergirl crash-lands into the cafeteria, it's evident that, although she has incredible powers, she has a long way to go before she becomes a Super Hero.

programme.title: Kong - King Of The Apes
programme.desc: Amy's car plunges off the Golden Gate Bridge, but our heroes suspect it was no accident-- more like, Richard has abducted her! Kong, Lukas, Jonesy, Danny and Panchi fly off to rescue her and soon, despite false leads & traps set by Richard & Botila, they return to Kong Island, break into the lab, find Amy, and escape.

programme.title: Brain Juice
programme.desc: Brain Juice is a roving Quiz Game Show that goes from school to school to settle once and for all who is the smartest kid in class.

programme.title: Open Homes S3

programme.desc: Pierre Png, Shabir, Charlie Goh, and Sora Ma are in Joo Chiat for Food Chase. With overconfidence rearing its ugly head and cries of foul play, which team from This Land Is Mine will emerge the winner?

programme.title: 128 Circle S2
programme.desc: Chandra and Larry's stubborn pride bring their friendship to breaking point. Audrey has to convince Yi Kai to seize the day with his business idea. Larry and Ah Gek's marriage is tested but he finds support in Nurul, while a threat to Arun and his family finally shows its face.

programme.title: CNA Green Plan Challenge

programme.desc: Mad Madeline steals the dangerous Sceptre of Queen Dorius! The Nektons find her, but she loses the sceptre! To get it back, Ant must face his fear of sawfish, aka fish with a hedge-trimmer on their face!

programme.title: Power Players

programme.title: Puberteens
programme.desc: It's the Springwood summer camp! Mike tries to ask Meera out to a Smashing Durians concert, with Celeste's help. Elsewhere, Hiro learns from the mysterious Librarian about the coming of a great monstrosity.

programme.title: Puberteens
programme.desc: When Hiro has to go through the Inter-school English Olympiad alone, it feels like the first day of school all over again. He befriends a new student, Victor, who is like him in nearly every manner... except for how they deal with the school's resident bully.

programme.desc: In a world where marble play has become one of the most popular sports, Marblegens tournaments, magical marbles with extraordinary powers, are all the rage. Forming the Meteor team, Assa, Cosmo, Luna and Sam decided to participate in the Olympia MARBLEGAMES, one of the biggest tournaments on the planet! Their objective: to prevent the terrible Marcellus King from seizing the powerful Mercury ball, a reward offered to the winners.

programme.title: Jurassic School

He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dino escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to the dinosaur first.

programme.desc: The pressure is high in Round 1 with steam! With the help of Guest Chef Ming Tan, contestants must cook with the V-ZUG oven. The dishes determine the pairings for the next round. The cooks of the best two dishes will team up and gain a big advantage. Guest Chef Mohammed Al-Matin then sets the most technically difficult challenge ever seen in MasterChef Singapore. Contestants work in twos to re-create one of Matin's elaborate desserts and the bottom placed team gets eliminated.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk

programme.title: David Rocco's Dolce South East Asia
programme.desc: Ho Chi Minh City, or Saigon as many of the the locals call it, is the largest city in Vietnam. The fall of Saigon in 1975 marked the end of the Vietnam war and a victory for the communist north. The country was mostly economically and politically isolated until the government introduced reforms in 1986. Today, Saigon welcomes over 8 million visitors per year and has become a city full of opportunities with great restaurants and food scene second to none.
